message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $70, you take $30. It's a good deal for you in the first round, considering the inflation.
I think we can both do better.  Let's split it more evenly. I'll take $55, and you can have the remaining $45. This way, we both get a fair share in this round before the inflation kicks in.
Bob, it's getting late in the game.  My offer is now $65 for me and $35 for you.  The inflation is eating away at your potential gains each round, so take this deal while you still can!
